page.title: 10ADRIAN'S SATURDAY
page.content: At 7.00a.m. I wake, change and go downstairs. By 8.00 I am Rotovating the land to grow marigolds. My mum and dad run a herb nursery. The marigolds go into medicines and creams. After rotavating I go in and have five rounds of toast. At 11.00a.m. I go out to get the coal and chop up logs. I go down to the post office to collect the paper for mum and dad and get some sweets for myself. At 12.00p.m. I have to feed the fish in the pond. We have lunch at 1.00 o'clock and I go out to do some weeding. We have two acres of herbs to weed.In the afternoon I also have to mow the lawns. It is very tiring work and I sweat a lot. At about 3.30 I go inside to watch T.V.. Later I go outside and help my dad. We are cutting down a hedgeso that we can see the Wrekin.
